column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Eventsandparticipants | Event # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Late last week on my way home from work I got into an accident that damaged my car .
#text=Luckily everyone who was involved came out uninjured but my car was damaged and would have to spend about two weeks in the shop .
#text=Since my insurance did not cover a rent a car this meant that I had to take public transportation for the next couple of weeks to get to work .
#text=I was fortunate to have a bus stop only a couple of blocks from my house so I would walk to the bus stop and wait for the bus with the other people .
#text=Some people talked to one another and others like myself had headphones in , listening to music .
#text=It is not that I am against talking to people I am just not really a morning person and do not feel like it at 7AM .
#text=The bus pulled up and we got in line to board and showed him our ticket to ride .
#text=I then grabbed a seat and gazed out the window until I reached my stop downtown .
#text=I got up , thanked the bus driver and got off the bus and started walking down the street to work .
